trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ger händelsedata som används som en parameter-objekt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"> </xref> händelser för rot- <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen exponeras som den `e` parametern i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>händelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>händelse utlöses innan en ny vy visas på grund av slutanvändaren Klicka och dra i ett diagramområde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>händelsen inträffar bara när den nya vyn har skapats.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Det är viktigt att Observera placering och storlek för en vy inte kan anges i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>händelse eftersom i det här fallet vyn redan har skapats.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ViewEventArgs innehåller följande egenskaper: – <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>-egenskap som används för att hämta den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objekt som de som visas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>egenskapen hämtar namnet på diagramområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Andra egenskaper för diagram område kan också anges.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>-Egenskap som används för att hämta den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objekt som är kopplad till vyn.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att avgöra vilken typ av axlar som kan vara X, Y, X2 eller Y2, använda den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Andra axelegenskaper kan också anges.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>-Egenskap som representerar den nya positionen för en vy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>-Egenskap som representerar den nya storleken för en vy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>-Egenskap som representerar måttenheten för storleken på en vy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den klass med det angivna axis och newPosition parametrar.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Axelns skala vyn.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: Startpositionen för den nya vyn för skalan.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den klass med det angivna axis , newPosition , newSize och newSizeType parametrar.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Axelns skala vyn.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: Startpositionen för den nya vyn för skalan.

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: Den nya skala Visa storleken.

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: Visa måttenhet storlek för den nya skalan.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objekt som tillhör en vy.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen exponeras i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>händelser för rot- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen kan användas för att:-bestämmer vilken typ av axeln – X, X2 Y eller Y2 – som händelsen som utlöses, använder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Get och set axel egenskaper, till exempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objekt som representerar axelns som tillhör en vy.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objekt som tillhör en vy.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen exponeras i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>händelser för rot- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>egenskapen kan användas för att fastställa det diagramområde som vyn tillhör genom att öppna den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen kan också användas för att hämta och ange egenskaper för diagram område.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objekt som representerar det diagramområde som tillhör en vy.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar positionen för en vy axeln.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen exponeras i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>händelser för rot- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objekt och representerar den nya positionen för en vy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen NewPosition kan anges till ett nytt värde i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>händelse, men kan inte anges till ett nytt värde för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>händelse eftersom i det här fallet vyn redan har skapats.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: NewPosition är alltid mäts axelvärde.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> värde som representerar positionen för en vy axeln, vilket är antingen längst ned i en lodrät vy eller vyn Vågrät placering till vänster.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger storleken på en vy axeln.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> värde som representerar storleken på en vy axeln.

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: Storleken är antingen höjden på vyn lodräta eller vågräta vyn bredd.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar måttenhet för den nya storleken för en vy.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: När den här egenskapen har angetts <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, måttenhet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>egenskapen automatiskt bestäms av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>styr och kommer att vara ett tal eller en dag.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: Kom ihåg att den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>egenskapen alltid mäts axelvärde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollera att typen om du uttryckligen ställa in storleken typen matchar axelns rullningslisten tillhör.

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: Med andra ord inte anger <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>om axeln inte använder <xref:System.DateTime>värden.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Observera att den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>egenskapen kan anges till ett nytt värde i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>händelse, men kan inte anges till ett nytt värde för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>händelse eftersom vyn redan har skapats.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> -värde som representerar måttenheten för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>-egenskap som representerar bredden eller höjden på en datavy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.
